jobDescription: JOB SUMMARY AND SCOPE The Sr. Business Intelligence Analyst will manage the functional operation, maintenance and support of defined business systems for supply chain. This role serves as the subject matter expert for supplier performance data/compliance metrics and is seen as the go to functional resource for the business teams to drive efficiencies and appropriately leverage our system capabilities. This role will partner with IT and various internal business partners to support business needs.    PRINCIPAL JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES    1. Manage data/supplier information  2. Lead reporting efforts to support issue resolution  3. Create and manage scorecard development and data accuracy/validation  4. Track supplier performance and propose improvement actions to cross functional teams  5. Address supplier inquiries about metrics and performance  6. Continuously look for improvements and accuracy to data reporting   Requirements
